alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 2:33PM PST until January 04 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 1500 to 2500 feet, with lower snow level closer to the Columbia Gorge. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Heaviest snowfall will be north of the Santiam River Valley. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very challenging at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills
